subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: The triumph of Usain Bolt in the men’s 100-meter sprints delighted his followers in Brixton, a London neighborhood that’s home to a large and proud Jamaican population.
snippet: The triumph of Usain Bolt in the men’s 100-meter sprints delighted his followers in Brixton, a London neighborhood that’s home to a large and proud Jamaican population.
